As well as cheaper Freedom Mobile, targeted towards urban millennials (as it is already) that is less aligned to official Shaw brand
So once LTE is built out, expect a full-service, high-priced Shaw Wireless service that can be bundled with TV and internet
Brad Shaw said today they'll launch "other wireless services" over next year. Freedom CEO Alek Krstajic told me the same back in the fall
1. From Shaw CEO comments today and Wind/Freedom CEO comments in fall, it's clear to me that Freedom will eventually be flanker brand
